name: Wolverine
keywords: Jean Grey School For Higher Learning

special_powers.name: I STAND WITH WOLVERINE
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game if Wolverine is part of a Jean Grey School for Higher Learning themed team, replace this character card with their [WvCR] #001.1 character card.

special_powers.name: WEAPON X REJECT
special_powers.description: STOP. Combat Reflexes, Super Senses.

special_powers.name: HEALING FACTOR
special_powers.description: Toughness // When Wolverine clears (one or more) action tokens, heal him 1 click.

special_powers.name: CONTROLLING THE MAGNETIC FIELDS
special_powers.description: Opposing characters within 2 squares and line of fire consider Magneto adjacent for movement purposes.

special_powers.name: MAGNETIC FORCES TO REPEL AND ATTRACT
special_powers.description: Energy Shield/Deflection, Willpower. Barrier as FREE, but only to generate 1 blocking terrain marker. // When moving, opposing characters adjacent to Magneto's Barrier marker must roll for break away if they don't already need to.

name: Rogue
keywords: Jean Grey School For Higher Learning

special_powers.name: I STAND WITH WOLVERINE
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game if Rogue is part of a Jean Grey School for Higher Learning themed team, replace this character card with their [set symbol] #011.1 character card.

special_powers.name: LET ME GIVE YOUR POWERS A SPIN FOR A WHILE, SUGAH
special_powers.description: When Rogue hits a single opposing character with a close attack, after resolutions you may choose a standard power that character can use. Until you choose again, Rogue can use the chosen power and has the printed range value of the hit character.

special_powers.name: SOUTHERN BELLE
special_powers.description: Invulnerability, Willpower.

special_powers.description: When Rogue hits a single opposing character with a close attack, after resolutions you may choose a standard power that character can use. Until you choose again, Rogue can use the chosen power and has the printed range value of the hit character and the hit character can't use the chosen power.

special_powers.name: SOUTHERN BELLE
special_powers.description: Invulnerability, Willpower.

special_powers.name: CYCLOPS WAS RIGHT
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, if Colossus is part of a Utopia themed team, replace this character card with their [WvCR] #012.1 character card.

special_powers.name: I SHALL HOLD THEM FOR YOU, COMRADE
special_powers.description: Plasticity. Whenever Colossus is not holding an object and hits an opposing character with a close attack, after resolutions choose one: attack -1 -or- defense -1. A hit character modifies the chosen combat value -1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: I SHALL HOLD THEM FOR YOU, COMRADE
special_powers.description: Plasticity. Whenever Colossus is not holding an object and hits an opposing character with a close attack, after resolutions a hit character modifies their attack and defense -1 until your next turn.

name: Iceman
keywords: Jean Grey School For Higher Learning

special_powers.name: I STAND WITH WOLVERINE
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game if Iceman is part of a Jean Grey School for Higher Learning themed team, replace this character card with their [WvCR] #013.1 character card.

special_powers.name: WATCH YOUR STEP... IT'S SLIPPERY
special_powers.description: When Iceman hits one or more opposing characters with a range attack, choose one for all hit characters: speed -2 -or- attack -1. Hit characters modify the chosen combat value until your next turn.

special_powers.name: MY ICE SLIDE WILL MELT... EVENTUALLY
special_powers.description: Barrier, Toughness, Willpower. Whenever Iceman moves, after resolution of each move, you may immediately place a Blocking terrain marker in a square he moved through. Remove that marker at the beginning of your next turn (even if thisis lost).

name: Cannonball
keywords: Jean Grey School For Higher Learning

special_powers.name: I STAND WITH WOLVERINE
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game if Cannonball is part of a Jean Grey School for Higher Learning themed team, replace this character card with their [set symbol] #017.1 character card.

special_powers.name: BLAST-OFF!
special_powers.description: Sidestep. POWER: Improved Movement: Characters. Move in a direct path, then make a close attack targeting all characters Cannonball moved through, regardless of adjacency. Instead of normal damage, hit characters are dealt Cannonball's printed damage value and placed into a square that he did not move through adjacent to their current square.

special_powers.name: BLAST FIELD
special_powers.description: Toughness. At the end of your turn, if Cannonball moved at least 1 square this turn, choose one: Energy Shield/Deflection -or- Impervious. He can use the chosen power until your next turn.

name: Cannonball
keywords: Jean Grey School For Higher Learning

special_powers.name: BLAST-OFF!
special_powers.description: Sidestep. POWER: Improved Movement: Characters. Move in a direct path, then make a close attack targeting all characters Cannonball moved through, regardless of adjacency. Instead of normal damage, hit characters are dealt Cannonball's printed damage value and placed into a square that he did not move through adjacent to their current square.

special_powers.name: BLAST FIELD
special_powers.description: Toughness. At the end of your turn, if Cannonball moved at least 1 square this turn, he can use Energy Shield/Deflection and Impervious until your next turn.

special_powers.name: CYCLOPS WAS RIGHT
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game if Magik is part of a Utopia themed team, replace this character card with their [WvCR] #018.1 character card.

special_powers.name: STEPPING DISC THROUGH LIMBO
special_powers.description: Phasing/Teleport. When Magik uses it, she has PASSENGER: 2 and may carry characters regardless of [Flight Symbol]. After resolutions, if she moved 5 squares or less, she may make a close attack modifying attack -X where X is the number of characters that she carried

special_powers.name: SORCERESS OF LIMBO, WIELDER OF THE SOULSWORD
special_powers.description: Blades/Claws/Fangs, Steal Energy.

special_powers.name: CYCLOPS WAS RIGHT
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game if Psylocke is part of a Utopia themed team, replace this character card with their [WvCR] #020.1 character card.

special_powers.name: PSYCHIC BOW
special_powers.description: Incapacitate. When she uses it and hits, after resolutions, choose a standard attack or defense power the hit character can use and that character can't use that power until your next turn.

special_powers.name: NINJA TRAINING
special_powers.description: Sidestep, Stealth

special_powers.name: PSYCHIC BOW
special_powers.description: FREE: Choose one to use this turn: Incapacitate -or- Penetrating/Psychic Blast. // When Psylocke hits with a range attack, after resolutions choose a standard attack or defense power a hit character can use. That character can't use the chosen power until your next turn.

special_powers.name: NINJA TRAINING
special_powers.description: Sidestep, Stealth

special_powers.name: WEAPON X
special_powers.description: FREE: Make a close attack, but only to target an (adjacent opposing) character that hit Wolverine with an attack since your last turn. // When a friendly character is KO'd, after resolutions remove an action token from Wolverine.

special_powers.name: MUTANT HEALING FACTOR ON OVERDRIVE
special_powers.description: STOP. Regeneration as FREE. (Regeneration heals 1 less on a STOP click.)

special_powers.name: ASSEMBLING AN INTERDIMENSIONAL X-SOCIETY
special_powers.description: During force construction, characters with keywords that begin with "X-" gain the X-Men keyword (if they don't have it already).

special_powers.name: MAGNETO'S MENTAL SHIELDING HELMETS
special_powers.description: PROTECTED: Mind Control, Outwit, Penetrating/Psychic Blast.

special_powers.name: WE CAN STILL DO THIS... IF YOU ALL LISTEN TO ME
special_powers.description: STOP: When this click is first revealed, after resolutions heal Cyclops a number of clicks equal to the number of other friendly characters on your force.

special_powers.name: AVATAR OF DEATH
special_powers.description: Gambit deals penetrating damage.

special_powers.name: NOXIOUS GAS
special_powers.description: Poison. When Gambit uses it, opposing characters withing 3 squares are considered adjacent.

special_powers.name: YOU GOT TO TAKE WHAT'S COMING TO YOU, HOMME
special_powers.description: Incapacitate. When Gambit uses it as a CLOSE action, hit characters are given 2 action tokens instead and gain Immobile until your next turn.

special_powers.name: BRIGHTWIND
special_powers.description: Charge, [Wing Symbol]

special_powers.name: PSIONIC ARROWS
special_powers.description: Incapacitate. When Moonstar uses it, also deal her damage value divided among hit target(s).

special_powers.name: CHOSEN FOR BATTLE
special_powers.description: STOP. Invulnerability, Super Senses. For the rest of the game, Moonstar can't be healed past this click.

special_powers.name: ANGEL OF DEATH
special_powers.description: Steal Energy, but with close or range attacks. When Archangel uses it and heals, modify his defense +1 until your next turn.

special_powers.name: UNBELIEVABLE DESTRUCTIVE FORCE:
special_powers.description: Pulse Wave, Telekinesis, [Improved Targeting: Blocking].

special_powers.name: ETERNAL STRUGGLE
special_powers.description: When Wolverine is hit with a range attack, after resolutions you may place him in any unoccupied square adjacent to the attacker. If you do, heal him 1 click. // Modify damage +1 if targeting a character with a range value greater than 0.

special_powers.name: RITUAL BATTLE
special_powers.description: Toughness. When Wolverine is hit with an attack, the maximum damage opposing characters can deal to Wolverine is their printed damage value. Protected: Pulse Wave.

special_powers.name: FERAL FURY
special_powers.description: Wolverine can't be carried.

special_powers.name: ETERNAL STRUGGLE
special_powers.description: When Cyclops is hit with a close attack, after resolutions you may place him in any unoccupied square within 2 squares and line of fire. If you do, heal him 1 click. // Modify damage +1 if targeting a character with a range value of 0.

special_powers.name: BLOOD MUST SPILL
special_powers.description: Steal Energy, but with range attacks.

special_powers.name: RITUAL BATTLE
special_powers.description: Toughness. When Cyclops is hit with an attack, the maximum damage opposing characters can deal to Cyclops is their printed damage value. Protected: Pulse Wave.

special_powers.name: FOCUSED FURY
special_powers.description: Cyclops can't be carried.
